rows.label: qev018891_MSG0001
rows.name:
Lots of BLADEs have died on the battlefield.
There aren't many of the old-time veterans left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0002
rows.name:
So this is the ideal time to begin actively recruiting
new members from among our xenoform allies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hmm. You there! You've got a look on your face like
you know a great deal about these xenoforms![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0004
rows.name:
...What do you mean, "What kind of look is that?"
When I speak to you, the only thing I want to hear
back is "YES, SIR!" Is that clear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0005
rows.name:
Now, I want you to introduce me to physically fit
xenoforms who would make promising BLADE
operative candidates. ...Right now, soldier![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest Heradot[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Wolf about the Ma-non with exceptional reflexes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_SEL0021
rows.name: Claim that no good candidates come to mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0006
rows.name:
How's that? You know a Ma-non that is extremely
physically fit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0007
rows.name: There's a shark hiding in that sea of shrimp?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0008
rows.name: So be it! I shall attempt to recruit this...Heradot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0009
rows.name:
And once I do, I will whip her into a BLADE that
New LA can be proud of![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmph. So once again we will need to rely on my own
uncanny eye for talent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0011
rows.name:
So be it. When I can find the time, I will board the
Ma-non ship and begin my hunt for a worthy BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0012
rows.name:
Turning weaklings into BLADEs is my destiny,
and one way or another, I will see it fulfilled![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Wolf about the Ma-non with exceptional reflexes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest Gi Zang[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Wolf about the Wrothian
with incredible combat Arts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0013
rows.name:
What?! You know a great Wrothian who can split into
copies and attack a foe from multiple sides?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0014
rows.name:
He would be a better candidate for BLADE than I'd
dared hope for! NLA's security would be guaranteed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0015
rows.name:
And you say his name is Gi Zang? I had no idea that
so great a warrior was lurking in our own city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018891_MSG0016
rows.name:
I will go to recruit him immediately. Heh heh heh...
I can't remember the last time I was so excited![ST:wait ]
